reviews.review: Fun to play with mates, shite to play with randoms
одни клоуны будто в цирк попал

La communauté de ce jeu est son plus grand problème.
Une grande majorité de gens toxiques (principalement d'origines slaves). Donc jouez avec des potes en compétitif sinon vous allez vite détester le jeu.
Sinon en soit le gameplay est juste normal, il n'y a rien de palpitant.

Наиграл в эту игру более 3 тыс часов, и что могу сказать, много агро школьников, которые бомбят на тебя когда ты на 1 месте, но попадаются и адекватные люди, которые в независимости от исхода игры, разговаривают адекватно

Counter Strike : Global Offensive 

My thoughts on this game are mixed, though very skewed to positive.
The game is infested with cheaters and toxicity although some of the community is quite nice.
The game 15 years old so don't come to the game looking for graphics, it does look quite nice for a 15 year old game.
I do think you should play in moderation ( just like everything else ) and also spend in moderation ( remember this game has skins, some of them are upward of $1,000 but if you don't budget, it's quite likely this game will be a vacuum on your pocket ).

So that wraps up my review, go ahead and look at some others because I'm just a normie that you shouldn't trust.
